info:
the first good ATARI ST musician. did a monster chipsong collection with the B.I.G. demo http://pouet.net/prod.php?which=11350 in january 1988. perhaps one of the first ST demos that got any attention. an inspriation for all chipmusicians on ST till the SID voice with Scavy came. :D

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/people/Andreas-Jochen-Hippel/529648533
